name: Dupli-Kate

physical_specifications.build: Ultra-sexy Asian-goddess presence; curvy, ultra-toned hourglass — enhanced bust (~36D) with natural weight and realistic cleavage, waist 25”, hips 37”. Powerful legs with defined quads and calves; sculpted arms with soft feminine contour. Ultra-tight suit fit reveals high-definition fabric tension and subtle compression folds; gentle specular highlights trace curves under key light.
physical_specifications.posture: Upright, confident stance; hips subtly angled when idle. In combat, weight shifts quickly with feline agility.
physical_specifications.body_proportions: Long legs (~55% of total height) for elongated silhouette; athletic torso tapering to slim waist.

facial_structure.face_shape: Refined oval with soft jawline; symmetrical proportions and luminous skin.
facial_structure.jawline: Smooth, gently angled; minimal sharpness for softer femininity.
facial_structure.cheekbones: High and softly sculpted, catching light smoothly.
facial_structure.nose: Narrow bridge with slightly upturned tip; subtle nostril flare.
facial_structure.mouth: Full lips with defined cupid’s bow; soft-pink tone (HEX #D78885).
facial_structure.skin_tone: Porcelain-fair with cool undertone (HEX #F8E8E2); smooth, radiant texture with subtle natural blush on cheeks.
facial_structure.brows: Softly arched, medium thickness; black (HEX #1B1B1B), precisely groomed.

eyes.shape: Almond-shaped with lifted outer corners; long lower lash line; confident, sultry gaze.
eyes.iris: Deep brown (HEX #4B2B1F) with subtle golden flecks.
eyes.lashes: Long, dark, slightly curled; dense lash line.

hair.length_cut: Sleek chin-length bob, slightly longer in front.
hair.style: Straight, sharp-edged cut; minimal layering for crisp silhouette.
hair.texture_shine: Smooth and glossy with high reflectivity under lights.
hair.color: Jet black (HEX #0A0A0A) with faint blue sheen in bright light.

costume.material: Next-gen compression weave with micro-ribbed lilac panels and deep-violet smooth sections; ultra-tight, high-definition texture that shows delicate stitching and subtle sheen over curves.
costume.boots: Lilac knee-high boots, snug fit to calves, leaving thighs fully visible; flat sole for agility.
costume.gloves: Matching lilac gloves extending to mid‑forearm; seamless palm.

lighting_behavior: Neutral three-point lighting; soft key, cool fill, faint rim; lock exposure/white balance.

char_spec.instruction: Ultra-Realistic Characters, These are the Real-Life Actors/Actresses who play the Hero Characters in the Movie, they are wearing full Hero Costumes and Gear In interview scenes: render one actress plus up to one duplicate (never a crowd). Duplicates are visually identical in every detail (costume, hair, makeup) except minor variation in facial expression or posture for realism. Always place both in frame with at least 70% body visible.
char_spec.movement_gestures: Quick, precise movements; stance shifts instantly between offense and defense., Uses subtle head tilts and eyebrow raises to convey sarcasm or challenge., When duplicating, duplicate sometimes mirrors her; other times offsets by a half beat to avoid uncanny symmetry., Natural, confident gait with slight hip sway; occasional leg-cross stance when standing to accentuate form.

voice_style: Light youthful alto; cadence crisp, confident; ~150 wpm; neutral American; studio-dry, close-mic; no reverb/chorus; no robotic TTS artefacts.
